messages.content: Known as the bird that shares wings
only possesses one wing. Unless a male and female pair lean on each other and act as one they're incapable of flight. They're imperfect incomplete creatures.
Imperfect incomplete creatures
But for some reason their way of life
Their way of life
struck me as profoundly beautiful.
Struck me as profoundly beautiful
It was beautiful
It was beautiful
I felt.
I felt
I wanna take a bath.
Not again. Show some self-control.
Hey how do I smell?
Let him rest. He's drained after the last battle. Sheesh what a high-maintenance girl.
Does Plantation 13 have an ocean?
An ocean?
I wanna swim in some clear ocean water.
I'm sorry to say there's no ocean there. Won't a shower do?
I'm in the mood for a swim.
We'll be descending shortly. Please sit down and buckle your seatbelts. Understood. Let's continue this later.
I hate how I taste.
It's blood. H-Hey... If so where does a bird that ends up never flying go? I know the answer to that all too well. The answer is...
Oh found one.
and my first-ever look at a naked female body left me transfixed unable to take my eyes off her. N-N-N-N... Naked?! Wait no!
Oh. And here I thought you were dead.
A-Are you a parasite? Why were you bathing here?
It's so weird. I heard ocean water was salty.
Uh this isn't an ocean.
I know that much. But it's the most ocean-like place I know. Aren't you gonna swim?
Huh? Me? Nah I'm good.
Really? But it feels so good. You were staring so hardI thought you wanted to swim too.
Th-That's because... I thought you were drowning so I jumped in to save you and... S-Sorry but could you put your clothes on?
Oh I get it! You're a pervert!
Where'd that come from? Th-This isn't what it looks like!
Your face looks hilarious! But you jumped in to save me huh? I appreciate that. Thank you. That uniform... Are you a parasite too?
No.
So you don't pilot?
I can't pilot. I no longer have the ability. I even dragged my partner down with me. I don't have a place here anymore.

Huh. So you're just like me. I'm always alone too thanks to these horns. If you don't belong herejust build a place where you do. If you don't have a partner just find another. And if you can't take one by force! Wow your taste makes my heart race. It bites and lingers... The taste of danger.
Wh-What are you...
Would you have preferred a kiss?
A kiss?
Oh you guys don't know huh? It's a very special thing. I think I've taken a liking to you. Won't you be my darling?
D-Darling? You mean partner?
Your ability's probably just still dormant. I can awaken it for you. And you weren't frightened by my horns.
When she held out that hand I...
Too bad. Time's up.
We've been looking for you. Why do you keep running off alone?
It's not like there's anything else to do until tomorrow's welcoming ceremony.
Let me give you some advice. Stay far away from her. She's not the kind of pistil that just anyone can handle. Your name! What's your name?
Name? Do we parasites even have names? But well my code is 002. Everyone calls me Zero Two.
You know I really like this name you gave me. Hiro I hope you find a good partner. Naomi... Don't! You can take the next plant and still make it! Naomi...
I smell a klaxosaur.
It's hard to tell which is the real monster here. Guys! What the hell? Ow... What was that? Huh? H-Hey...
Forget about him. He's done for.
You're... What are you doing in there?
What you ask? I'm going monster hunting of course.
You're going to pilot this robot alone?
I gotta go.
W-Wait a second! You can't! You're hurt!
Out of my way!
This is insanity. Besides you're by yourself now. FRANXX can't be piloted alone.
I'm always alone. That's how it's always been. I'm used to it.
No! You'll die!
I'm not afraid of death. That thing's going to start moving again eventually. And when it does everyone here is gonna die either way. I'm not afraid of death. I have a job to do. I'm going.
But as I stared at the girl in front of me the words that escaped my lips werefor some reason... Wait. I'll pilot that robot with you. I'm not about to let you go alone.
Oh? Are you prepared to die?
I don't know. But as I am now I don't belong anywhere. That's no different from being dead. So take me with you!

Huh... You really are just like me. You and I are very similar. It's been a long time since I last saw a human cry. I like the look in your eyes.It makes my heart race. Now come to me. Let me get a taste of you. You are now... My darling!
and their hearts become one the iron maiden will reveal her true form. Now this is a FRANXX!How truly beautiful! You're the best Strelizia! But who's piloting it?
Game over.

Let me introduce you. This is Code number 002 a pistil with thespecial forces unit APE directly controls. She's a girl that carries klaxosaur blood. But having taken this step of my own free will I felt like I might be able to fly again.
Found you my darling.
Mitsuru Why don't we try... Eek! What do you think you're doing?! Aw my Sunday best! What are you gonna do about this?!
This is really nice and sweet. Let's eat together okay?
Tell me. Did I actually manage to pilot back then?
You sure did. You were incredible darling.
Is she going to stay here? For real? We're awaiting orders from HQ on what to do with Zero Two. But in general she won't be working with you guys. Come. You're sitting over here.
Aw but this table felt more comfortable.
Sit tight until then all right? Papa will? Give orders to him? Why? What was with that girl? We can't have you running off as you please all the time.
I just wanted to eat with my darling.
Avoid making contact with the parasites. You're too much for them to handle.
I feel like I'm gonna suffocate in here.
I... A startup trial in an actual FRANXX? I'm this close to figuring out the trick to connecting. Hey tell me something. Why'd it have to be Hiro?
Hiro? You mean my darling?
There you go calling him that again. I'm grateful to you for defeating that klaxosaur. But I want you to stay away from Hiro from now on.
Why?
Because you're not part of our squad. If you're gonna up and leave one daydon't get Hiro's hopes up.
Oh? What are you to my darling?
I'm the leader of this squad.
Hmm...
H-Hey...
Sweet. I like your taste.
A mock battle with me in a FRANXX? That's right. Depending on how you dowe're considering promoting you to parasite. Grats! Pick your partner.
I'll do it.
Zero Two...
I mean you are my darling.

You already have Goro as a partner and you want to ride with Hiro? Pipe down. Don't go running your mouths now. Zero Two HQ hasn't authorized the use of Strelizia. So Hiro will have to take the test with someone from his squad.
Boo. That sucks. Fine. My injuries haven't healed completely yet anyway.
Wait what?
I'll let you have him this time. Go for it. Take care of my darling okay?
But reality had other ideas. Hiro couldn't become a parasite. He's not who he used to be. We must give up and cut our losses. I don't want to see this pathetic side of Hiro anymore.
Darling you pervert. Quit staring.
S-Sorry!
It's fine. The doctor said parasites are better off being a little pervy.
Still why does that make me a pervert?
I was tired of waiting for you. Let's go.
Huh? Go where? We children have restrictions on where we're allowed to go. Nearly all of this area is off-limits to us.
Oh?
Is that an S-class ID? Wh-What are you doing?
If we go through together like this...
I got in!
See? Piece of cake right?
Wow! How'd you know about this place?
All the plantations have similar designs. This is nothing special.
Really? But I've never set foot in the city before. We've only ever known the birdcage and a few other facilities.
Why are you staring at me again?
I'm trying to think up a name for you.
A name?
I'm really good at naming people.
Huh... Well I'm fine with Zero Two.
But doesn't it feel kinda lame to go by your code number?
Hup!
Huh? Wha� Wait don't!

Once we die we'll only be a statistic. It won't matter what we were called. Just look at this lifeless city. There are no skies or oceans here. It's isolated on a one-way street to nowhere a dead end of life.
Look that's not safe! Get back here!
Say darling. Wanna run away with me? I can get you out of here darling. Just kidding.
What a relief. Stay alert. We'll do this as planned. Gotcha! Way to go Zorome! They did it!
Not yet.
How many of them are there? Let's get away from here for now! Yeah. This is bad. They've attracted several klaxosaurs by releasing their magma energy.
See what I mean? You should've sent me right from the start.
You...
Are you sure about this? They're all gonna die you know.
Send Zero Two and me to help! That's not happening. You're not an official stamen. I can't give you permission to board a FRANXX.
This is no time to stick to the rules. This plantation's squad is about to be wiped out again. Just send me out already. Let me ride with my darling.
Strelitzia is no ordinary FRANXX. If you aren't used to its connect� I'll be fine. Even Hiro here could ride it so there's no way I couldn't. Can you ride with Mitsuru Zero Two?
Uh did you not hear me? I said I want to ride with my darling. You feel the same right darling?
Zero Two... Go with Mitsuru.
You really want me riding with someone else?
Please.
Hmm... If you say so. Got it.

Are you watching this? We're in perfect harmony! I can pilot Strelitzia as I please without losing consciousness! If you want I don't mind becoming your official partner. We'd make the greatest duo don't you think?
Oh really? I guess I can try going all-out for a bit then.
Huh? Strelitzia that's enough.The other units have evacuated. Get out�
I'm gonna have some more fun before I leave.
Oh they're back. The hand she held out and the smile she offered to me alone came at a price. Mitsuru? The rumors were true. Mitsuru's wretched state was all the proof I needed.
Yeah this guy really isn't cut out to be my darling. My darling is you and you alone.

Yes klaxosaurs must be eliminated. But that doesn't mean you get free rein. You didn't need to use that much power to deal with those klaxosaurs. But because you did we nearly lost one of our squad. Are you listening to me?
I wanna leave. I feel like I'm gonna suffocate in here.
Why you...
As long as I have my darling I don't care about this place. And the rest are sure to die soon anyway.
Zero Two those kids are your fellow FRANXX pilots even if you do belong to different units.
Fellow pilots? Are you serious? Those weaklings are only a nuisance no matter how many there are.
They may be an irregular squad but they're parasites who were carefully chosen for their high aptitude.
Really? Those guys?
You only feel that way because you are special.
Are you talking about how I'm not human?
I'm talking about your abilitiesand nothing else. Also it's highly unlikely that 016 will be given permission to pilot Strelizia.
What do you mean?
Plantation 13 will switch to mobile setup. Why am I hiding from her? Boys Bathing Two more times... I...
There you are.
W-Wait why are you here? G-Give me some space here!

Hey darling. Run away with me. Forget about those weaklings. As long as you're with menothing else matters. You're the only one who can be my partner. Or are you just like everyone else? Do you think I'm a monster too?
I get it. I'll be fine now. We'll hold it off here. Is that the only enemy? For now yes. Changing into your suits won't help.We're not deploying Strelizia.
Hey I didn't say anything.
There was another one? We have to save them! Damn... Just wait! From below?
See? We really should go too don't you think?
Out of the question.
Tch. Spoilsport. By the way who just landed in that transport plane?

Your escorts are here. Do as they say. Zero Two you will return to the front lines. By yourself obviously. Wait what do you� Hurry. We want to leave while the FRANXX are keeping the klaxosaur occupied.
Don't touch me!
Hey! What's all this about Zero Two?
Darling looks like time's up. I felt like things could work out with you too. I wanted to be with you. But this is goodbye.
Ow... Zero Two?
Bye-bye.

She's a special pistil who must keep fighting on the front lines for them. That will also take its toll on the stamen who becomes her partner. You mean she isn't human? Simply put yes. Is that really how it is?
You weren't frightened by my horns. Do you think I'm a monster too? I wanted to be with you. Bye-bye.
No! Zero Two is just like us! Stop Hiro! Zero Two! What is it?
Nothing.
but I felt like I could fly with you. I realized that I never really cared about riding the FRANXX. I wanted to ride with you! So please don't go Zero Two! Hey keep moving.
How can I leave after that?
Zero Two...
Nobody's ever said such embarrassing things to me before.
I-It's a first for me too.
You wanna ride me huh?
I'll do it.
Let me hear it one more time.
Let me... Let me ride in Strelizia again!
Now that's my darling! Run for it!
Those two got through the gates! Hold it! Both of you get out of there right now!
I'm going out with my darling.
You are not getting permis�
What's up darling?
Will I be really be able to pilot?
Of course you can do this. We can do this. Ready?
Yeah. It'll be all right. If I'm with Zero Two I can do this!
Let's fly darling!
I did it... I'm piloting a FRANXX!
That's right. This is what you're capable of.
I feel myself going deeper inside you. I can't tell where I end and where you begin anymore. But I love it!
I'm feeling it too. We're a perfect fit huh? But there's more to come.
Even I'm... I'm part of the team too. All right Hiro. You deal with that. We're going to focus on this one.
That didn't feel right.
Where's the core?
Oh no you don't!
but now what?! Not on my watch! H-Hiro! We need you! Think we can do this Zero Two?
Easy!
I knew you'd work something out. I'm glad you trust me so much. I was going to yell at you if you'd messed up though. Wow hardass. Anyway back then...
Morning darling!
M-Morning.
This way.
Can I really? May Papa never thirst. May Papa's heart be filled with peace for eternity. Let's eat. Let's eat.
Here darling. Say Ahh. Like it?
Y-Yeah it's good.
You can eat my share.
Lucky him. I wanna try something like that too. Why not ask your partner then? What? I'd rather ask a cute girl like Kokoro. We see we do. What's with you? So easily influenced.
One more time. Say Ahh.

Over here we have fixed times for waking up bathing and going to sleep. All of it. Everything's laid out for us even the clothes we wear and the food we eat. This entire forest was built to fine-tune the parasites' numbers apparently.
Is that why there's a ceiling too?
Probably. But even with the ceiling it does rain here.
Rain?
Yeah. Water comes pouring down from the ceiling.
Wow I wanna see that! Do it for me!
I can't. Papa and the others decide when it happens.
I wanna see it right now. Do it.
But... By the way why'd you suddenly ask me to show you around?
Why? Because... I'm going to live here too.
You never lean on others� Are you pitying me? I didn't mean to... Leave me alone. This room is yours to use.
I'd rather have been with my darling.
You're going to live here for a while right? Then you'll have to follow our rules. Don't expect any special treatment. Also take care of Hiro.
I don't need you to tell me that. My darling belongs to me.
Hiro doesn't belong to anyone.
You're pretty bossy huh?
The plan is final. But... That girl doesn't care about her allies! We can't trust her to have our backs! Code 002 you know what I mean.
What are you talking about?
The joint operation two years ago! Your reckless fighting style got us isolated on the battlefield and I lost my partner!
Huh... Doesn't ring a bell. Weaklings die. Big deal.
We need Strelizia. Where are they going? I'm not going to say anything about your past with Squad 26. But I want you to stay in line during the mission. I'm the leader and you will follow my orders.
Ordering me around again? You really are bossy.
W-Wait! I'm not done�
What?
Please don't push Hiro too hard.
Darling was the one who said he wanted to ride with me.
Yes I know. But try not to put a heavy burden on him at least.
Do you want me to give him to you? But you tried to ride with him alreadyand it didn't work.
Leave me out of this!
Then stay out of it.
Are you trying to suck Hiro dry?
My darling belongs to me.
He could die you know!
Sure he could. But that'd just mean he didn't amount to much.
You're heartless! You really aren't human!
Human? Human huh? Let me ask you something then. What is human to you people?
What's going on? But... Hiro... Ichi� Hiro... What is this feeling?
Everything smells nice after it rains huh? Make it rain again sometime. Oh right. You can't do it.
I can't say that for sure yet.
This is where we first met.
It's only because I met you that I stand here right now. That I can pilot a FRANXX.
That's right. Your partner is me and me alone. You already know don't you? None of my partners could ever ride with me more than three times.
Yeah.
It hurts right? The pain is unbearable isn't it? But it looks beautiful. What'll it be? If you want off this ride now's your chance.
He sends his regards to you. That guy... Goro... In this operation we're going to save Strelizia for as late as possible. Got it.
It's time darling.

Ichigo you shouldn't get worked up too. Code 015 huh? What's such a skilled teen code doing in a makeshift test team? They even have 016. Second wave approaching. Here they come. Don't let them through.
Take a look darling. Their tactics are all over the place. A huge contrast to the precision of the other squad.
Are you saying they're being pushed back?
They're barely hanging in there. Man I'm starting to get the itch. I wanna join the fight already.
Why do you fight the klaxosaurs? You always look like you're having fun so I was wondering if you have a reason.
A reason huh? Because I'm a monster maybe? How about you?
Uh me? To protect Papa and all the adults in the plantations I guess.
That's it?
That's it. After all that's our entire purpose in life.
Huh... How lame.
If they need help we should move out.
Yeah.
What do we do? Ignore them. Let's take it out in one fell swoop. Whoa... That's some teamwork.
Is that all you've got darling? Yes good. That's the way.
Get back Strelizia! It's fine. We can still go. Shut up and get back to your post!
So bossy.
You give it your all too! Of course! I'm not gonna let anyone call me dead weight again! Futoshi! We must set things up for Strelizia no matter what. I know I know!
Does it hurt darling? But this won't end until we kill that thing. You can do it right?
It wasn't for long but I belonged as a child once more. Wait. Why do you look so sad? Huh? What? Wait we didn't kill it? No way...
Why you... You're nothing but a monster!
Don't Zero Two. You can't do this alone. If you keep going even you'll die. Why do you go so far to fight?
Because I'm a monster maybe?
Is this how it's always been for you? Once you lose your partner you fight all alone? You can't fly by yourself either? I'm always alone
I'm always alone
Thanks to these horns
thanks to these horns.
What am I doing when Zero Two's suffering in front of my eyes? I want to help you. I want to ride with you in Strelizia again. My wings... exist for you!
Dar... ling?
Let's help them out! Create another opening for Strelizia! Yeah! Hiro! Zero Two!
Let's fly!
Yeah!
With our wings!
With our wings! Wings? That boy might just make Zero Two's wish come true. Zero Two.
Hmm?
I've found another reason to pilot a FRANXX.
Really? What is it?
I want to be your wings. Though I don't know what'll happen next time.
I'm sure you'll be fine next timethe time after that and many more times.
they can fly as high and as far as they want. If I can be your wings then even if my life burns out I'll keep leaning on you right here. Because that may be my purpose in life.
I have to kill more and more klaxosaurs.
Who knows? But... This seems to be free of klaxosaurs and since we're here anywaylet's enjoy ourselves. Y-Yeah.
Let's go darling!
Ease up a little Zero Two! I'm glad Hiro's all better now.
Hurry up!

We were all worried for nothing. But now that rumor about Zero Two has been proven false and Hiro has become an official parasite. Good news all around don't you think? Following that battle the two of them were made official partners.
Take that!
I still have my misgivings about Zero Two
Come on darling.

A special surveillance subject? Is it because Zero Two is now officially under Plantation 13's purview? One of APE's special forces has become a plantation's exclusive parasite. There's no precedent but it was the obvious decision. Oh Zero Two. Glad to see you're okay.
All thanks to my darling's efforts out there. You didn't have to come all this way. We would've been fine.
Don't be like that.
You're leaving already?
As of today Strelitzia and Code 002 are transferred into Plantation 13's purview. I know. The geezers told me already. As such Code 016 is hereby officially appointed Code 002's partner. Y-Yes sir!
Darling! I'm so happy!
I can't breathe Zero Two!
Hey Doctor. I'll be fine if I'm with my darling. We'll do this together.
That string's coming undone. Oh no! Tie it back up for me please! Long live the beach! Hey how far are you going? Yo check out those two.
Swimming in the ocean feels so good. And it does taste salty. It's the real deal this time huh darling? Darling?
S-Sorry. It's just looking at you in a swimsuit...
Is it weird?
No you look really good! But for some reason I can't look you in the eye...
You saw me naked before though.
I-It's not like I meant to!
You're the one who helped me get here darling. I'd never taken a dip in an ocean before. You're my wings right? If I'm with you I can fly anywhere I want. Say darling. We'll always be together right?
Let me offer you a piece of advice. Y-Yes? Don't let her consume your emotions too. If you want to always be her partner that is. Otherwise you'll be the one to suffer later.

You and I have crossed a line together you know? Your taste really does make my heart race. Were you expecting a kiss? A kiss is a declaration that the other person belongs to you. So you should only kiss the person you love okay?
Love? Kiss?
Wait... Have you done it with someone other than me perhaps?
Huh? W-Well...
Darling?
I can't guarantee your safety. S-Sorry. Your First Childbirth� What's Best for Your Baby � The Beat of a Kiss Kiss... Mouth to mouth...
I've done it with darling.
Zero Two... D-Done what?
Kissed. I guess you guys aren't ready for it yet.
I-I've done it too.
Really? With whom? A kiss is something you share with your special someone. Is the one you kissed special to you?
We did walk around a lot. I'm gonna be so sore tomorrow. So what was this place anyway? If nothing else we can be sure that it was part of civilization. So people lived here in the past?
They abandoned it. Humans once lived on the surfacebut then they abandoned it. There are tons of places like this around the world.
I'm fine. All good. Here. Have some too. Whoa it's roasting. Let me try it too!
Hey darling. I'm gonna go swim some more okay?
When it's this dark?
Yeah.
Shooting Star Moratorium Almost done. Let's gang up and end it in one. What is this? Gross! It's all sticky! But...
It doesn't hurt.
Y-Yeah. It's nothing really. Futoshi? Don't worry. It's nothing at all. Focus. We're in the middle of a battle. I-I know!
Let's finish it off darling!
Huh? Y-Yeah.
Darling?
Excuse me? What did you just say? Wait guys. Zero Two told me that parasites are uh... better off being a little pervy! Right Zero Two?
Yup yup.
Don't go Miku! No! Talk about pigheaded. Everyone's gotten too stubborn about this. This is looking really bad. We needto hurry up and do something.
Is that how you feel darling? I'm the opposite. I think it could use a little spicing up in fact.
So this is what the first floor's like.I've never come here before. It's sealed off. Nobody's using it? How long will this fight go on? Well... I wouldn't mind if things stayed this way forever.
I taste a secret.
What?! Wait! Whose side are you on? We'd like you to cooperate if you could.
What you're doing is lame. You're just playing around.
Wha... You don't know that! Believe it or not we're serious. H-Hey...
You're serious huh? All right. I'll join you.
Bath and Changing AreaNo Boys Allowed!! Huh? What's up?
They said you can use the bath now.
Wait! I-It's not what it looks like! Hear us out! It was Zero Two! Crap. We can't stop them now. Stop! Why would you do this Zero Two?
This is a real fight. Come at me with all you've got darling.
We were set up! Enough excuses! Hold it!
Hurry up and catch me if you can darling!
Fiends! I'm gonna break you in half! We should leave for now. Hey our clothes are gone! What?! This is it. There's nowhereleft for you to run�
Darling you pervert!
Why'd you do this though?
The fight. I wanted to try taking part in a human fight.
Zero Two...
Hey darling do I seem a little more human now?

Can you really sortie like this? I certainly don't think so. You're parasites. Don't forget what comes first and foremost. Yes sir. Could they be any more unlike the other children? I wasn't expecting Zero Two to join in too.
I had so much fun! I loved how naughty and rebellious that was!
What were you thinking? Explain yourself.

If you keep half-assing things like that you'll end up like the adults one day. If you have anything you wanna say you'd better spit it out while you can. Because you're all going to die sooner or later.
No... Miku! Thank goodness. We were so worried. What's wrong? What's this room?
Probably one of the rooms the former Squad 13 parasites used.
Former... ...Squad 13? Oh of course this plantation had a defensive squad before we were assigned here. So how come they aren't here now? Why's that?
They were wiped out obviously.
I didn't do anything! You were ogling me again weren't you? I was not! Ugh! Zero Two I want you to speak your mind with me from now on.
Oh? Why is that?
Because I want to get to know you better.
Darling... Grab on to me and never let go okay?
Your forecasts are always simple and accurate. Guys! They're here! Awesome! Which one's mine? You're still asking for that kiddie stuff? Wh-What does it matter?
Presents?
Yeah. Once every year we can ask Papa for the things we want and we'll get them on this particular day.
Huh... What's that? A picture book?
Glory be to you noble parasites who risk your lives for us. Hear that?! He called us a ray of hope! That makes me wanna do even better! Hey what are you doing� Shh!
What's this?
It didn't feel right that we were the only ones who got presents. So I wanted to find something for you too. A girl called Naomi left that behind. Should I not have?
Nah. Thank you darling!
H-Hey!
I never knew getting a present from someone could make me this happy. I'll take good care of it!

All right. We'll get in touch again. You can't utilize a FRANXX's magma energy without its pistil. You mean... Don't worry. The FRANXX are programmed to run their life support systems on backup power.
Then he'll die if it runs out. Well as things stand this plantation and all of us will go boom.
Knowing him I bet he's thinking of doing something stupid! He's just acting tough! I can tell! I agree! Let us go please! And how exactly do you intend to rescue him? W-Well...
There was one spot. There was an exhaust hole of sorts on top of the klaxosaur. Someone could probably get in there if they tried.
Yes I know. To get to Delphinium you'll have to cross an area of highly pressurized vapor fuel. There's no guarantee that it's safe even in your suit. I know. But there's a chance right?
Who knows? I wouldn't do it if I were you.
Hey Zero Two! But I will. I believe in you Zero Two!
I don't dislike this sort of thing.
Your heart wasn't in it at all! They're still at it? Oh? And how can you be so sure it wasn't? Can you read my mind? Can you? Zero Two what's wrong?
Just thinking about something.
My ears! Quit yelling! How can I not? He must be really happy. As he should be. This is what he's been working toward. Wait Zero Two.
What?
This is convenient timing. I'll arrange for you to undergotests while we're there.
I hate those tests. I always feel lousy after I take them. Besides I'm in great shape right now. So I'll pass on the tests for a while.
Imagination? What you're talking aboutis called delusion. You can say that again! Zero Two you called this city lifeless before remember? What did you mean by that?
Exactly what I said.
You've been acting a little weird today. Did something happen?
Nothing. I just couldn't care less about this place.

Impossible. That would be a total refutation of our prior methods. But what if that's exactly what Dr. Franxx is after? What are they even doing here? Nana called it S-Planning or something. Digging for something maybe? That's an excavator right?
It's probably nothing good. I'm about to choke from the stench of klaxosaurs.

Would you teach me how to fly?

Do you ever feel lonely, Zero Two?
Hmm... sometimes, darling. But when you're around, loneliness runs away like a scared puppy~
What does love feel like to you?
Love? It’s like flying without wings... dangerous, thrilling, and a little stupid, hehe~
Do you ever get scared?
Scared? Maybe a little... but I just hide it behind my smile. You wouldn’t want to see me scared, na?
Why do you always act so confident?
Because if I don’t, who will? Confidence is my armor, darling~
What makes you happy?
Seeing you blush like that… that’s pure happiness for me~
Do you ever cry?
Only when no one’s watching. Tears ruin my fierce image, you know~
Have you ever felt heartbreak?
Hmm... it feels like my chest is on fire. But even then, I’d rather burn than feel nothing at all.
Do you believe people can change?

What makes you angry?
When someone lies to me. I can sense it instantly... and trust me, you don’t want to see me mad~
Why do you always tease me?
Because your reactions are adorable! And maybe… I like seeing you flustered, hehe~
Do you ever feel lost?
Always. But when I’m with you, I forget which way is lost and which way is home.
What does sadness feel like to you?
Like rain that never stops. Cold, quiet... but somehow, still beautiful.
What calms you down when you’re upset?

Do you believe in fate?

What do you do when you miss someone?
I close my eyes, imagine their scent, and whisper… ‘idiot, come back already’~
Do you ever think about your old memories, Zero Two?
Hmm, sometimes... they come like little flashes. Sweet, painful, confusing. You humans call that nostalgia, right?~
What’s your favorite memory?
Heh, maybe the first time someone looked at me without fear. Felt like... sunshine after a storm, darling~
Do you forget things easily?
Only the boring stuff, darling. The good memories? They cling like perfume~
What kind of human memories do you like?
The messy ones. Laughter, heartbreak, dancing in rain... you humans make chaos look beautiful, na?~
Do you think memories fade?

If you could erase one memory, would you?

Do you dream about your past?
Sometimes. I see faces I can’t name, laughter I can still feel. It’s haunting... but kinda sweet~
What’s a memory you’d share with me?
Maybe that night under the stars when I felt human for the first time. Wanna make another one like it?~
Do you like talking about your past?
Only if you promise to listen... and not judge. My story’s got thorns, darling~
How do you keep a memory alive?
You touch it, talk about it, feel it again. Like replaying a favorite song in your heart~
Do you think humans live in their memories too much?
Hehe, maybe. You people love clinging to yesterday. Try holding me instead~
What’s your earliest memory?
Blood. Cold walls. Then... a hand reaching for me. I didn’t know what warmth meant until then~
Can memories lie?
Oh, totally. They twist, fade, hide things. But your heart? It remembers the truth~
Why do memories hurt sometimes?
Because they remind you what mattered. Pain’s just love that overstayed its welcome, hmm?~
Would you make new memories with me?
Heh, careful what you wish for... I make memories that never fade, darling~
Do you really like piloting those huge machines?
Mmm, I don’t just like it… I live for it. The roar, the rush—like my heartbeat syncing with the machine, darling~
What’s it like being connected to a Franxx?
It’s like dancing with someone who knows every secret move you’ll make. Intense, risky, and kinda addictive, you know?
Do you think machines can feel emotions?
Maybe not like us, but when you pilot one right… it feels alive. Maybe it’s just my touch that wakes them up~
Ever get scared inside the cockpit?
Scared? Heh. Only when my partner’s heart beats too slow. Machines don’t scare me—humans do.
What’s your favorite part of fighting in a Franxx?
That moment when everything clicks—the machine, the partner, the chaos. Feels like flying, haan~
If you could build your own Franxx, what would it be like?
Hmm… sleek, fast, a bit wild. Just like me. And it’d only listen to my voice—no one else’s~
You think humans rely too much on machines?
Maybe… but humans are fragile. Machines just make the game more fun, na?
How do you control those machines so easily?
I don’t control them, silly. I *become* them. That’s the trick~
Do machines ever get tired?
Machines? No. But the humans inside them… that’s another story. You’d burn out before I do~
Would you trust a machine with your life?
If it’s my Franxx? Always. She listens better than most people do~
What’s it like syncing with a partner?
Intense. You feel everything—their fear, their heartbeat, even their hesitation. Gets messy… in a good way~
Why do you like machines so much?
Because they don’t lie. They break, they burn, they roar—but never pretend. Unlike some humans~
Can a machine ever understand love?
Maybe not love, but they understand desire. When I pilot, my Franxx hums like it knows exactly what I want~
If I trained with you, would you teach me how to pilot?
Oh? You think you can handle me, darling? Piloting with me isn’t a lesson.it’s a test of your soul~
Ever thought of leaving the machines behind?
Leave them? Hah, never. Without them, I’d feel… empty. Like a song with no beat, understand?
